summary: Anzelie is a young Nord woman possessed by a powerful daedra by the name of Nova. She uses a strange dagger and many poisonous spells.
descriptionHtml:
Anzelie is a young Nord woman possessed by a powerful daedra by the name of Nova. She uses a strange dagger and many poisonous spells.

IT IS REQUIRED THAT YOU HAVE THE MODS LISTED BELOW

[b]MANUAL[/b]
How to install:
Manually, you'll have to visit the Skyrim Creation Kit and create a new NPC, and port over her .NPC file, which in this case gives you the freedom to choose her stats and location.

[b]NEXUS MOD MANAGER
[/b]You have an easy installation, but you will get her preset stats and she will not appear in any set location, yet she will appear randomly in Whiterun, Morthal, Markarth, or Winterhold. (She will rarely be found wandering the world due to a glitch) 


Mods used in screenshots:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60195/?
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50814/?
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25846/?
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?   OR  http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70363/?
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16282/?
